reasoning: Prostate adenocarcinoma is the predominant histological type of prostate cancer. Global prostate cancer incidence ~27 per 100k males from GLOBOCAN 2005. 'Advanced' refers to clinical stage but epidemiological data typically reports all adenocarcinomas without stage stratification. High confidence from cancer registry data.
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
